column8:
Samuel Johnson , also known as Dr. Johnson was a gifted English author. He contributed to English litrature through many mediums including poetry, essays, morals, novels, critiques, biographies and lexicography (the art of writing, compiling & editing dictionaries).

Some may have been put-off by his odd gestures and tic s , which was posthumously diagnosed as Tourette syndrome but there is no denying he was a literary genius.

There are many famous and memorable quotes by Dr. Johnson and we therefore have created a series of designs admiring his quotes such as ones titled:

Absurdity , Curiosity , Distinction , Happier , Inclined , Laughed , Reminded , Tomorrow  and Truth .

For a humourous view on Johnson, also see this Blackadder episode .
